name: Name
new_password_sent_to_your_email: New password sent to your email
new_email_verification_sent_to_your_emai: New email with verification instructions sent to your email
please_verify_your_email: Please verify your email before login
max_avatar_size: Max image size for avatar %{size} MB
error_while_saving_data: Error while saving data. Please try again.
set_geolocation_to_always: Set geolocation settings to 'Always' to use this functionality
see_you_position_on_map: To see your position on the map, set geolocation settings to 'Always' or 'While Using the App'
enable_geolocation: Enable geolocation in settings to use the app
verify_your_email: You have to verify your email. If you did not receive mail with verification instructions please select 'Resent verification email'
start_typing_to_search_contacts:
Start typing to search contacts.
Search is case sensitive
no_contacts_with_that_name: No contacts found with this name
set_distance_value: You will receive a push notification when the distance (kilometers) between you and your friend is less than the specified value
show_position_on_map: Show my geolocation on the map
show_position_only_to_friends: Show my geolocation only to my contacts
allow_other_users_to_see_my_geolocation: Allow to show my geolocation on the map, and other users can see it (You can change this option in Settings - Confidentiality)
before_share_my_geolocation_i_agree: Before I share my geolocation, I agree that I:
notifications_disabled_to_this_app: Notifications disabled for this app. To see push notifications enable it in settings
dont_show_position_on_map_for_this_conta: Do not show the position on the map for this contact

validation_message.server_is_not_available: Server is not available. Please try later.
validation_message.password_requirements: Password should be more %{symbols} symbols. Contain at least one character and one digit, one lower case and uppercase symbol
validation_message.user_with_this_email_already_exist: User with this email already exist
validation_message.user_with_this_name_already_exist: User with this name already exist
validation_message.user_with_this_email_and_password_not_ex: User with this email and password not exist
